name: Tickets, Tickets, More Tickets
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Fantastic Arcade Gamemaking Frenzy Jam

Collect as many tickets as possible

Two Player versus game where players compete in trying to get as many tickets as possible from the ticket machine. Click the button to withdraw the ticket.

Controls

Player 1:

A key to press button

D key to push away opponents hand

Spacebar key  select

Player 2:

Right key to press button

Left key to push away opponents hand

Enter key  select
